Summary: Saw two small gray dots moving fast from east to west zig zagging then turn to the north and were gone
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side haveing a smoke and doing some star gazing with my son when i saw two small gray dots moving too the west zig zagging back and forth like they were playing a game in the air....moving verry fast i could tell that it was not a plain no sound and no landing lights no lights at all...I ask my son if he could see what i was seeing and he said yes....we watched it head north until it was gone...this took all of about 30 sec
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Vista
There were no other sightings in Vista on or around July 18th 2012
